    PEOPLE-INSIDE

    2016.03- 2016.12
    Arduino/ Ultrasonic sensor/ Android application/
    Wi-fi Shield/ Php& MySQL/ C language

    PEOPLE-INSIDE team developed a real-time indoor people counting system using arduino ultrasonic sensor and android application. We applied random forest which is machine learning algorithm to sensor data for high performance.

    Healthy Elevator

    2015.09- 2015.12
    Java/ Java Swing

    WestSun team made a Healthy elevator which recommends a user to use stairs in some cases. Those some cases are when you go adjacent floors, and when the Waiting time for the elevator is too long. We used Java Swing to implement GUI and we used thread to implement functions.

    Twitter

    2015.11- 2016.12
    Database/ MySQL/ Java Swing

    I made Twitter with Java and access database with mysql. There are several functions like real Twitter such as login, logout, following, messaging in borad, user search, changing password etc.

    White-flag and Blue-flag game

    2016.09- 2016.12
    Robotics/ Arduino

    I made a White-flag and Blue-flag game machine with arduino. I used servo motors to move each flag, mp3 module& SD card& Speaker for save sound tracks and play it, LCD to display your game point, LED for light effect and Switch buttons to order flags motions.
